alert.note: Alert for Conway; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 1:31AM CDT until April 05 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Conway County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Yell County in central Arkansas... Southern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 130 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Petit Jean River WMA, or 10 miles east of Danville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Ola... Hector... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Hattieville... Petit Jean State Park... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Mosley... Taral... Lake Dardanelle... Appleton... Holla Bend... Blackwell... Economy... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central Arkansas.
